body_html:
@peterjc123 Thanks for your work. Would you be willing to focus on a reviewable PR into pytorch master i.e. without monolithic commits? If you bring the core devs along for the ride, I think this effort will be more likely to really stick.

I'd love to give this a go on Windows, but I'm not very keen on working off of stale forks, TBH. I'd bet others are in my boat.

Thanks again.
